statements: DELETE FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_date < '2021-01-01' AND satisfaction_score < 5

DELETE FROM survey_questions WHERE question_text LIKE '%customer%' AND question_id >= 5;
DELETE FROM ratings WHERE rating_value < 3 AND survey_id = 5 AND customer_id = 7;
DELETE FROM ratings WHERE rating_value < 3 AND customer_id = 5;
